title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs. The Board of Directors consists of 23 members elected by the Board of Governors. These members can not be on the Board of Governors. Its function is to direct the general operations ...

title: EBRD Board of Directors
snippet: While retaining overall authority over the Bank, the Board of Governors delegates most powers to the Board of Directors, which is responsible for approving the EBRD's country, sector and thematic strategies, policies and operations.

title: PUBLIC 1 PUBLIC PROCEEDINGS OF THE
snippet: The Governor for Austria, Mr Magnus Brunner, was the Chair of the Board of Governors.

title: EBRD governance and leadership
snippet: The EBRD is owned by 77 countries, the European Union and the European Investment Bank. Each shareholder is represented on the Board of Governors which has overall authority over the Bank and approves its strategic direction.

title: 2020 election of the EBRD President
snippet: The EBRD's Board of Governors elected Odile Renaud-Basso as President to succeed Sir Suma Chakrabarti in October 2020.
